Package tn.esprit.querybuilder.interfaces

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DeleteQuery
    An interface to build DELETE queries.
    Field
    A Field can be used in select and where clauses and represents a database field or an aggregate function on a database field.
    InsertQuery
    An interface to generate INSERT queries.
    QueriesFactory
    Factory interface to create query-builder objects such as fields and queries.
    Query
    Parent interface for a select, update, insert or delete query.
    SelectQuery
    Interface to generate a SELECT query.
    UpdateQuery
    Interface to generate an update query.
    WhereClause
    Generates a WHERE clause.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    SelectQuery.JoinType
    An enumaration of the different join types.
    SelectQuery.OrderBy
    Order ascending or descending.
    WhereClause.WhereOperator
    The where operator.
